page.title: Home
page.text: I am a software engineer from Rhineland Palatinate, DE.

box1.title: Initial Programming Experiences
box1.description: Initial experiences in programming by developing a 2D game using the Unity Game Engine and first experience with Javascript and Web Development

box2.title: Part-Time Job as Assistant
box2.description: Part-time work at Zewotherm GmbH. Continued until the start of german Ausbildung in August 2021.

box3.title: Achievement of Middle maturity Certificate
box3.description: Achieved Middle maturity Certificate at IGS Remagen.

box4.title: German Ausbildung as an Application Developer (FIAE)
box4.description: Commenced training as an application developer at Zewotherm GmbH. Expected completion of the german Ausbildung is on July 31, 2024.

box5.title: Development of Flutter App besides the German Ausbildung
box5.description: In addition to the training, I developed and publish apps with Flutter for Android and iOS and websites with NuxtJs
